SCTX:
Begin BMFrostDaedraScript

short doOnce

if ( doOnce == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	set deaddaedra to ( deaddaedra + 1 )
endif

if ( deaddaedra >= 10 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Draugr < 80 )
		Journal BM_Draugr 80 
		set doOnce to 1
	endif
endif





End BMFrostDaedraScript
